label: Helius
name: helius
description: Perform Helius on-chain operations on Solana

options.label: Get NFT events
options.name: nft-events
options.description: Returns all NFT events given an address.

options.label: Get NFT Portfolio
options.name: nfts
options.description: Returns all the NFTs that the given address currently holds.

options.label: Name Lookup
options.name: names
options.description: Does a reverse lookup with the given address for Solana Naming Service domains.

options.label: Get Token Balances
options.name: balances
options.description: Returns the native Solana balance (in lamports) and all token balances for a given address.
